data.title: Saudi Arabia’s World Cup Playbook
data.meta_description: Welcome to the Mideast Money newsletter, I’m Adveith Nair. Join us each week as we chronicle the intersection of money and power in a region that's become one of the most influential in global finance. Sign up here.
data.text:
Welcome to the Mideast Money newsletter, I’m Adveith Nair. Join us each week as we chronicle the intersection of money and power in a region that's become one of the most influential in global finance. Sign up here.

Two years after Qatar hosted the most expensive FIFA World Cup ever, Saudi Arabia unveiled plans for the 2034 event that’s expected to be played in the kingdom.
